about_the_game:
• Beautiful Pixel Art and environmental animations bring the world to life!

  • A lighthearted and mysterious story told through unforgettable characters.

  • Explore a vast non-linear world inspired by the golden era of JRPGs.

  • Stylish Retro turn based battles that happen in the world you explore.

  • Mine metals, gather materials, and craft new weapons for even more power!

  • Get to know the characters of the world through emotional moments and interactions.

  • A diverse party of 6 playable characters to enlist and fight along side.

  • Find, purchase, craft, and unlock rare weapons and armor to equip your party.

  • A beautiful and nostalgia filled soundtrack that will bring you back to the 90's golden era.

  • Full controller support.

In the enchanting world of Seed of Nostalgia, ancient myths and modern magic intertwine. For centuries, the secluded village of Arboreum, nestled atop the colossal World Tree Verdan'Thala, has safeguarded the mystical Gaia Seed, the primordial source of life and balance.

Atilla, a young and aspiring Spirit Blade, is about to complete his training and fulfill his duty to protect the sacred tree. However, a mysterious event disrupts his ancient Ascendance rite, and sends his village into a state of despair.

As the Gaia Seed begins to wither, Atilla must descend from the World Tree for the first time and journey across a land filled with wonders and dangers. Alongside a cast of unique and compelling characters—including Aleister, the enigmatic Obsidian Mage; Roland, the eccentric Alchemist; Terra, the compassionate Prismatic Mage; and Hawk, the cunning Marksman—Atilla seeks to uncover the truth behind the disruption and restore the life-giving power of the Gaia Seed.

Yet, shadows loom over their quest. Lord Heinrik Vandran, the enigmatic leader of a distant corrupt kingdom, seeks to unravel the world’s balance, driven by a hidden agenda tied to an ancient and malevolent religion. As Atilla and his companions unravel the secrets of the Gaia Seed and the ancient temples that sustain it, they uncover a deeper conspiracy that challenges their beliefs and forces them to confront the very nature of sacrifice, duty, and destiny.

Seed of Nostalgia offers a rich, retro-inspired JRPG experience with stunning pixel art, engaging turn-based combat, and a heartfelt narrative. Explore lush forests, mystic deserts, and frozen mountains as you guide Atilla and his allies through a tale of hope, friendship, and the enduring power of life itself. Will you be able to save the Gaia Seed and restore harmony, or will the ancient darkness consume all?

Classic Combat, refined.                                                                                                       

No random encounters, no wasted time—just engaging, tactical battles. Exploit enemy weaknesses, master elemental strategies, and find rare powerful equipment that unlocks additional class abilities and power. A refined take on classic turn-based combat that’s as rewarding as it is nostalgic.

  • Engage in Retro turn-based battles where every move counts!

  • Unlock skills and abilities by leveling up, or by finding certain legendary equipment.

  • Gain TP through various actions, then spend it to unleash special enemy obliterating abilities!

  • Exploit your enemies weaknesses by selecting specific Elemental skill types.

  • Face fearsome and outrageous fully-animated boss encounters.

  • Arm yourself with weapons, armor and accessories unique to each character.

name: Seed of Nostalgia

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Microsoft® Windows® 7 (32-bit/64-bit) or later
  • Processor: Intel N4100 (or similar) or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9/OpenGL 4.1 capable GPU
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: %100 DirectX 9 compatible
  • Additional Notes: 1280x720 resolution capable monitor
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Microsoft® Windows® 10 (32-bit/64-bit) or later
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-6100 or better
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL ES 2.0 hardware driver support required for WebGL acceleration
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Sound Card: %100 DirectX 9 compatible
  • Additional Notes: 1280x720 resolution capable monitor

short_description: Seed of Nostalgia is a beautiful pixel art JRPG which follows the tale of Atilla and a cast of intriguing characters on a quest to save their dying world. Explore a mystical land, unravel dark secrets, and confront ancient forces in a tale of magic, sacrifice, and unexpected revelations.
